alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 4:34AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota...South Dakota... Iowa... Flandreau Creek near Flandreau affecting Moody and Pipestone Counties. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Union, Sioux and Lincoln Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River above Hawarden. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, some farm houses on the South Dakota side of the river are isolated by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning and continue rising to a crest of 23.1 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Sioux River Hawarden 20.5 18.3 Sun 4 am 20.7 23.0 22.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 745 AM CDT.
